CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Start on boot
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Initialize Subcore automatically after each boot.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Low-memory device
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable this for skinned devices (Samsung, LG, etc) to avoid running out of memory.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable power aware
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable this to bypass battery/charging status when running the Subcore algorithm.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable sleep aware
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable this to bypass screen state when running the Subcore algorithm.

Preference.android:title: Kill all
Preference.android:summary: Press this to forcefully kill all instances of the Subcore daemon.
